ComicInfo.Summary:
When a meteor carrying the Zombie virus hits Earth it triggers the potential end of mankind. The last chance for humanity is the spacecraft full of Alien scientists tasked with tracking the interstellar virus. One that has wiped out many other planets. What will happen when humans must team with aliens to survive the zombie apocalypse? Find out in Aliens Versus Zombies!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------------------|--------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Sean Chen & Ivan Nunes | 1 | | B | Cover B | Anthony Spay & Sanju Nivangune | 2 | | C | Cover C | Giuseppe Cafaro & Brett Smith | 3 | | D | Cover D | David Seidman | 4 | | E | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Nick Percival | 5 |
Note: This issue was released at San Diego Comic-Con before regular retailers.
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Anthony Spay,Brett Smith,David Seidman,Giuseppe Cafaro,Ivan Nunes,Nick Percival,Sanju Nivangune,Sean Chen
